info.name: PilotsOntip Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for PilotsOntip Backend with all 90+ endpoints including AI Assistant, all CRUD operations, and dashboard management. Import this into Postman to test all APIs.

request.description: Start a new conversation with the AI assistant for booking
Continue existing conversation by providing case_id
Start chat as existing user with email
Get complete conversation history for a case

body.raw:
{
    "name": "John Doe",
    "email": "john@example.com",
    "phone": "9876543210",
    "user_type": "new",
    "query_type": "booking",
    "last_message": "I want to book a ride"
}

{
    "service_name": "Airport Transfer",
    "service_description": "Premium airport pickup and drop service",
    "service_price": 1500.00,
    "service_duration": 60,
    "service_availability": true
}

{
    "full_name": "John Doe",
    "business_email": "john@company.com",
    "contact_number": "9876543210",
    "service_interest": "technical support",
    "message": "I need help with booking issues"
}
